title: What is the main importance of human memory? - Quora

response.answer_text: You answered it within the question memory the ability to withhold as much knowledge and information as we can not only that but we can restore with our sensory memory. By simply using our sights and thru smell as well helps you remember a certain scent anf what not. So it's very important that memory we all have not alike but not so different at times.

Human memory is an essential faculty. From early in our evolution, we have had a need to remember which plants to avoid, which animals to avoid, which ones were good to eat, where to find food, shelter, a mate etc. We have survived only because our mental capacity has outstripped that of other animals which were bigger than us, stronger than us, and had bigger teeth etc. Those which could not learn, could not improvise and could not REMEMBER the lessons…died out….
